DOC.brief_title: Non-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Angiography With t-SLIP Technique
DOC.detailed_description: The t-SLIP Investigational Study Sequences design compare t-SLIP standard MR contrast enhance image technique establish diagnosic benefit t-SLIP compare contrast enhance MR technique . The t-SLIP Investigational Study Sequences use vascular MRI Imaging include , limited , MRA renal , mesenteric , abdominal aortic , iliac femoral artery . We target adult patient undergo standard body MRA examination without anesthesia . The time spatial label inversion pulse ( t-SLIP ) technique use non contrast enhance MR angiography imaging . It produce bright blood spin label image use single acquisition combination spatially nonselective inversion pulse spatially selective inversion pulse . The nonselective pulse inverts magnetization entire imaging area . The spatially selective pulse , apply upstream artery interest , reverts proton full magnetization . A pre define time delay tag image allows tag spin reach image region suppresses background tissue within image region extent .
